parentDataList.nodeContext: RetryPolicy<Object> retryPolicy=new RetryPolicy<>().withMaxAttempts(5).withDelay(5,10,ChronoUnit.SECONDS).onFailedAttempt(e -> LOG.log(Level.WARNING,String.format("%s failed",connectionMessage))).onRetry(e -> LOG.log(Level.WARNING,String.format("Failure #%s. Retrying.",e.getAttemptCount()))).onRetriesExceeded(e -> LOG.log(Level.WARNING,"Connection aborted."));
